title: How do we make a good topic for dissertation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Choose an area of interest, then narrow it down, to a specific phenomenon, and try to identify two or more variables each affecting each other. For example, use of social media online which influences purchasing intention in Amazon.in, so here social media a factor influences second factor purchasing intention in the background of online shopping context. Further queries - mbaprojectshelp4u@gmail.com
